detaileddescription.para: The view is represented as a vector indexed by i) subcarriers and ii) OFDM symbols.

detaileddescription.para: The view is represented as a vector indexed by i) subcarriers and ii) OFDM symbols.

memberdef.argsstring: (float ce_val, unsigned subcarrier, unsigned symbol, unsigned rx_port=0, unsigned tx_layer=0)
memberdef.name: set_ch_estimate

briefdescription.para: Sets the channel estimate for the resource element at the given coordinates.

description.para: The statistics are stored in one-dimensional vectors. Indices vary, first, with the Rx port and, second, with the Tx layer (e.g., the index corresponding to the second Rx port and to Tx layer 4 is $(2-1) + (4-1) * \mathtt{nof\_rx\_ports}$).

briefdescription.para: Estimated reference signal received powers (linear scale).
Estimated reference signal received powers (linear scale).
Average energies per resource element (linear scale).
Estimated signal-to-noise ratios (linear scale).
Maximum supported number of receive ports.
Maximum supported number of transmission layers.
Maximum number of transmitreceive paths.
Maximum total number of REs in a channel estimate.
Number of subcarriers considered for channel estimation.
Number of OFDM symbols considered for channel estimation.
Number of receive ports.
Container for channel estimates.

detaileddescription.para: The channel estimate should be thought as four-dimensional tensor with dimensions representing, in order, subcarriers, OFDM symbols, receive ports and, finally, transmit layers. However, it is represented as a single vector, indexed in the same order: i) subcarriers, ii) OFDM symbols, iii) Rx ports, and iv) Tx layers.

briefdescription.para: Constructor: sets the size of the internal buffers.
Default destructor.
Transforms a port-layer pair into a linear index.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned subcarrier, unsigned symbol, unsigned rx_port=0, unsigned tx_layer=0) const
memberdef.name: coords_to_index

briefdescription.para: Transforms a four-dimensional coordinate into a linear index.

simplesect.para: Instantiating an object of this class entails a heap memory allocation.
